org.descripter.js

Class Visitor<S extends Script<?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.descripter.js.api.Context<Key,java.lang.Object,W>
      • org.descripter.js.api.Objective<W>
        • org.descripter.js.api.Script<S>
          • org.descripter.js.Visitor<S>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Descripter, Interpreter, Scriptizer

    public abstract class Visitor<S extends Script<?>>
extends Script<S>

    An abstract base class for JavaScript parser visitors.

    Since:
    Descripter 1.0
    Author:
    J.J.Liu (Jianjun Liu) at http://www.descripter.org
